visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the title 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart should have axes and labels styled with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include two series: 'Product A' and 'Product B', each with monthly sales data. Custom colors should be applied to the columns, and additional configurations should include chart margins, background, and legend settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a column chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart type is set to 'column', and it includes two data series: 'Product A' and 'Product B', each with monthly sales data. The x-axis represents the months, while the y-axis represents the sales figures. The axes and labels are styled with specific colors and font sizes to enhance readability. Custom colors are applied to the columns of each series, and additional configurations include chart margins, background settings, and legend styling. The legend is enabled and styled to match the overall theme of the chart. The plot options for the column chart include point padding and border width settings to ensure a clean and visually appealing layout.
